text: Miisiirii (also called Mileri or Jabal) is a language of western Sudan, spoken by the Messiria of Jebel Mun (Jebel Moon) in Darfur, with a few speakers scattered in Chad.Rilly, Claude. 2010. Le méroïtique et sa famille linguistique. Leuven: Peeters Publishers. Miisiirii belongs to the Taman language family. It is often considered a dialect of Tama, though it is not particularly close. ==References== Category:Taman languages Category:Languages of Chad Category:Languages of Sudan
title: Miisiirii language
